mapper.select:
select ps_id psId, ps_name psName, pst_name pstName, ps_type psType, ps_starttime psStarttime, ps_endtime psEndtime, ps_getmoney psGetmoney, ps_money psMoney, us_name usName, us_id usId
from `projects` p left join `projectstype` pr on pr.pst_id=p.ps_pst_id left join `user` `u` on p.ps_us_id = `u`.us_id
where p.ps_type=0
mapper.update: update projects set ps_type=1 where ps_id=#{id}
update projects set ps_type=5 where ps_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select us_name name, cm_content comment from comments left join user on cm_us_id=us_id where cm_us_id=#{id}
